get.description: This method gets all the operations.

default.description: Error response describing reason for operation failure.

get.description: Lists all the addresses available under the subscription.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: $filter is supported to filter based on shipping address properties. Filter supports only equals operation.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on Get list of addresses, which provides the next page in the list of addresses.

200.description: List of addresses available under the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing reason for operation failure.

post.description: This method provides the list of product families for the given subscription.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: $expand is supported on configurations parameter for product, which provides details on the configurations for the product.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on list of product families, which provides the next page in the list of product families.

parameters.name: productFamiliesRequest
parameters.description: Filters for showing the product families.

200.description: The list of available product families under subscription.

default.description: Error response describing reason for operation failure.

post.description: This method provides the list of configurations for the given product family, product line and product under subscription.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on list of configurations, which provides the next page in the list of configurations.

parameters.name: configurationsRequest
parameters.description: Filters for showing the configurations.

200.description: The list of configurations for the given product family, product line and product under subscription.

default.description: Error response describing reason for operation failure.

post.description: This method provides the list of product families metadata for the given subscription.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on list of product families metadata, which provides the next page in the list of product families metadata.

200.description: The list of available product families under subscription.

default.description: Error response describing reason for operation failure.

get.description: Lists order collections at subscription level.

parameters.name: $skipToken

default.description: Error response describing reason for operation failure.

parameters.name: addressResource
parameters.description: Address details from request body.

default.description: Error response describing reason for operation failure.
Error response describing reason for operation failure.

patch.description: Updates the properties of an existing address.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The patch will be performed only if the ETag of the job on the server matches this value.

parameters.name: addressUpdateParameter
parameters.description: Address update parameters from request body.

default.description: Error response describing reason for operation failure.
